verses.roman:
ei mata śiśu-līlā kare gauracandra
dine dine pitā-mātāra bāḍāya ānanda

synonyms: ei—this; mata—like; śiśu-līlā—childhood pastimes; kare—does; gauracandra—Śrī Gaurahari; dine dine—day after day; pitā-mātāra—of His parents; bāḍāya—He increases; ānanda—the pleasure.
translation: In this way Gaurahari performed His childhood pastimes and day after day increased the pleasure of His parents.
